_sText:
de_illmatic

Explore a huge riot-worn city from the tops of the skyscrapers to the chaos ridden streets below. The job of the counter-terrorists is to fan out across the sectioned off part of the city and destroy all terrorists while preventing a terrorist bombing. The job of the terrorists is to destroy all counter terrorists and bomb the counter terror organization establishment or the sky scraper look-out point. 

Counter-terrorists! STOP THE RIOTS!

Terrorists! Bring the rioting to a new level of destruction and chaos!

Authors note:

REMEMBER! This map plays better as a LOW GRAVITY MAP! 
Enter sv_gravity 200 into console.


This map - despite my bias - is probably one of the most fun / well built that I've played. I did my best to include all the best features of the Source engine. If you're into city combat, you'll love de_illmatic.
